channel.title: Locations on Chaotic Online
channel.description: Recent content in Locations on Chaotic Online

item.title: Glacier Plains
item.description: The Glacier Plains is a region on the north-easternmost part of the OverWorld.

item.title: Lake Ken-I-Po
item.description: The Lake Ken-I-Po is a region on the central-south part of the OverWorld.

item.title: UnderWorld City
item.description: The UnderWorld City is the sinister capital of the UnderWorld

item.title: Crystal Cave
item.description: The Crystal Cave is a region on the south-westernmost part of the OverWorld.

item.title: Riverlands
item.description: The Riverlands is a big region on the south-southwest part of the OverWorld.

item.title: Lava Pond
item.description: The Lava Pond is a region on the south-southwest part of the UnderWorld.

item.title: Iron Pillar
item.description: The Iron Pillar is the central Pillar of the seven mighty Pillars holding the ceiling up in the UnderWorld

item.title: Forest of Life
item.description: The Forest of Life is a region in the east-northeastern part of the OverWorld

item.title: Kiru City
item.description: Kiru City is the magnificent capital of the OverWorld

item.title: Bodal's Arsenal
item.description: Bodal's Arsenal Region OverWorld Rarity Ultra Rare Initiative Wisdom

item.title: Carnival of Confusion
item.description: Carnival of Confusion Region Unknown Rarity Ultra Rare Initiative Speed

item.title: Castle Bodhran
item.description: This strange stronghold is built in a style that might best be called "bizzarechitecture" Castle Bodhran Region OverWorld Rarity Super Rare Initiative Power

item.title: Castle Pillar
item.description: It's rumoured that the most vicious Creature in Perim is imprisoned here, but only Chaor truly knows Castle Pillar Region UnderWorld Rarity Ultra Rare Initiative Courage

item.title: City of M'arr
item.description: City of M'arr Region M'arrillian Territory Rarity Unknown Initiative Unknown

item.title: Cordac Falls Plungepool
item.description: ...and strike the lake miles below, exploding outwards into the fray Cordac Falls Plungepool Region UnderWorld Rarity Common Initiative UnderWorld

item.title: Doors of the Deepmines
item.description: In a rare sign of solidarity, all four Tribes guard the massive doors, hoping they never open again Doors of the Deepmines Region UnderWorld Rarity Uncommon Initiative Speed

item.title: Dranakis Threshold
item.description: The few who have survived utter nary a word of what lies beyond Dranakis Threshold Region OverWorld Rarity Super Rare Initiative Courage

item.title: Everrain
item.description: Lake Ken-I-Po seeps through the UnderWorld ceiling in an unending reminder of the OverWorld's aqueous bounty Everrain Region OverWorld Rarity Common Initiative Wisdom

item.title: Fear Valley
item.description: One night here means a lifetime of nightmares Fear Valley Region UnderWorld Rarity Uncommon Initiative Courage

item.title: Forest of Life, During Aichlyys
item.description: Forest of Life During Aichlyys Region OverWorld Rarity Uncommon Initiative Power   On those rare nights when the triad stars of Lup, Lec, and Teo shine above the forest, all secrets are brought to light In the Animation, during the events of When a CodeMaster Calls, Ulmar, impersonated by Ulmanator, was taking a beating from Peyton’s Vinta, flying around with his Torwegg, appearing and disappearing with his Invisibility at Rao’Pa Sahkk, the Ocean with no Water, one of the many Mirage Locations in Al’Mipedim.

item.title: Frozen Fire
item.description: The ocean of flames chills as it burns Frozen Fire Region OverWorld Rarity Uncommon Initiative Wisdom

item.title: Gigantempopolis
item.description: The ancient beings who once dwelled here faded into oblivion - proving indisputably that size doesn’t matter Gigantempopolis Region OverWorld Rarity Uncommon Initiative Power

item.title: Glacier Plains, M'arrillian Heat Cannon
item.description: M’arrillian Heat Cannon Region OverWorld Rarity Super Rare Initiative Number of Mugicians   If the ice melts, Perim will die. We must stop it... no matter the sacrifice... Tangath Toborn In the Animation, during the apex of the M’arrillian Invasion, the M’arrillians succeeds building their heat cannon and start melting the mountains on Glacier Plains.

item.title: Glacier Plains, M’arrillian Melting Camp
item.description: M’arrillian Melting Camp Region OverWorld Rarity Ultra Rare Initiative Fluidmorpher   In order to accomplish their goal of flooding all of Perim, making a big ocean out of it, the M’arrillians settled down a camp so they could build the heat cannon to melt the ice mountains. The Mugical aura of the Glacier Plains feels this disturbance and unless a sacrifice is paid, in the form of Mugicians, the trespassers will be severally penalized by having all of their Attributes cut-off by 50 points each.

item.title: Gloomuck Swamp
item.description: For very different reasons both Crawsectus and Antidaeon choose to call this murky mess home Gloomuck Swamp Region OverWorld Rarity Common Initiative Courage

item.title: Gothos Tower
item.description: The horrific home of the harrowing Lord Van Bloot Gothos Tower Region UnderWorld Rarity Rare Initiative Speed

item.title: Ice Pillar
item.description: Ice Pillar Region UnderWorld Rarity Unknown Initiative Unknown

item.title: Jade Pillar
item.description: Jade Pillar Region UnderWorld Rarity Ultra Rare Initiative Power

item.title: Jagged Pillar
item.description: Jagged Pillar Region UnderWorld Rarity Unknown Initiative Unknown

item.title: Kaizeph, City of the Elements
item.description: Unlike all else, the Citadel is the foundation of everything Kaizeph, City of the Elements Region OverWorld Rarity Super Rare Initiative Number of Elements

item.title: Kiru City Tunnels
item.description: Kiru City Tunnels Region OverWorld Rarity Uncommon Initiative Muge

item.title: Kiru Village
Lake Ken-I-Po, Ritual Site
item.description: Lake Ken-I-Po, Ritual Site Region OverWorld Rarity Rare Initiative Number of Elements   As the towers emerged, all wondered what more lay below the surface The Ascension of Kaizeph is more than just the emergence of the City of Elements to the skies of Perim, it’s a ritual occurring in Lake Ken-I-Po.

item.title: Lava Pond, Milla'iin's Foothold
item.description: Lava Pond Milla'iin's Foothold Region UnderWorld Rarity Rare Initiative Power   In the Animation, during the M’arrillian Invasion, in order to maximize the flooding caused by the melting of the frozen mountains of the Glacier Plains, Perim had to be partially reshaped. Milla’iin, a M’arrillian Chieftain, established a foothold in the Lava Pond commanding Khybon, the first of the Creatures Phelphor successfully brainwashed, to build enormous pipes on the East walls of the Lava Pond in order to inundate everything with the waters of Everrain.

item.title: Mipedim Oasis
item.description: For those struggling to survive the Mipedian Desert, this is a welcome sight. But it is what they can't see that will prove most dangerous Mipedim Oasis Region Mipedian Territory Rarity Rare Initiative Courage

item.title: Mipedim Oasis, Aichlyys Fest
item.description: Mipedim Oasis Aichlyys Fest Region Mipedian Territory Rarity Unknown Initiative Unknown

item.title: Mount Pillar
item.description: The Danian homeland provides vital structural support to the UnderWorld ceiling, explaining why Chaor has resisted its demolition Mount Pillar Region Danian Territory Rarity Rare Initiative Wisdom

item.title: Mount Pillar Reservoir
Najarin's Castle
item.description: Najarin's Castle Region OverWorld Rarity Super Rare Initiative Number of Mugicians

item.title: Prexxor Chasm
item.description: Prexxor Chasm Region Unknown Rarity Super Rare Initiative Creatures from the Past

item.title: Rao'Pa Sahkk
item.description:
• Chimegrid
            • The Ocean with no Water

item.title: Rao'Pa Sahkk Chimegrid
item.description: Rao'Pa Sahkk Chimegrid Region Mipedian Territory Rarity Common Initiative Number of Mugicians   The sound reverberated far and wide — the Song of Doom!

item.title: Rao'Pa Sahkk, the Ocean with no Water
item.description: Rao'Pa Sahkk the Ocean with no Water Region Mipedian Territory Rarity Common Initiative Fire

item.title: Ravanaugh Ridge
item.description: Ravanaugh Ridge Region OverWorld Rarity Common Initiative Power

item.title: Riverlands, Abandoned Wastes
item.description: Riverlands Abandoned Wastes Region OverWorld Rarity Common Initiative Fewest Elements   After the defeat of Aa’une, the remaining M’arrillians fled to the Doors of the Deepmines leaving all damage caused behind. The Riverlands became an ugly and desolated place… But in a collective effort, as seen during the events of Elementary, Rellim, the Riverlands’ Caretaker, Hune Canin, Najarin, Garv, Caretaker of Lake Morn and the Servant of Water, Unda, in an apparent visit to the OverWorld, succeeded in destroying all of M’arrillians’ dams and, the most important, purified the water so life could once again return to the region.

item.title: Riverlands, Erak'tabb's Foothold
item.description: Riverlands Erak'tabb's Foothold Region OverWorld Rarity Rare Initiative Wisdom   In the Animation, during the M’arrillian Invasion, in order to maximize the flooding caused by the melting of the frozen mountains of the Glacier Plains, Perim had to be partially reshaped and to do so the M’arrillians had to build dams in strategic locations.

item.title: Rock River Canyon
item.description: A metaphor for patience: just one tiny stream carved the land into a canyon over the course of a thousand generations Rock River Canyon Region OverWorld Rarity Super Rare Initiative Courage

item.title: Runic Grove
item.description: Secret symbols or a simple secret? Many have been tantalized by what remains indecipherable to this day Runic Grove Region OverWorld Rarity Common Initiative Courage

item.title: Silchaw's Mine
item.description: Since Aszil opened the Tremor Gate, the very bedrock of Silchaw's Mine has gone mad! Silchaw's Mine Region Unknown Rarity Rare Initiative Courage

item.title: Skeletal Springs
item.description: Skeletal Springs Region OverWorld Rarity Uncommon Initiative OverWorld

item.title: Steam Pillar
item.description: Steam Pillar Region UnderWorld Rarity Unknown Initiative Unknown

item.title: Stone Pillar
item.description: Without the Pillars, there would be no "Over" and "Under", but simply "World" Stone Pillar Region UnderWorld Rarity Super Rare Initiative Wisdom

item.title: Storm Tunnel
item.description: Even those who cannot fly do so here Storm Tunnel Region OverWorld Rarity Common Initiative Power

item.title: Tablet Sanctuary
item.description: Though the tablet answered many long-debated questions, not every Creature liked the answers Tablet Sanctuary Region Mipedian Territory Rarity Common Initiative Speed

item.title: The OverWorld Library
item.description: From cookbooks to Cothica clues, every book written is within The OverWorld Library Region OverWorld Rarity Uncommon Initiative Water

item.title: The Passage, OverWorld
item.description: From the warm rays of the inviting sun, the stairs spiral into chilling darkness... The Passage, OverWorld Region OverWorld Rarity Rare Initiative OverWorld

item.title: The Passage, UnderWorld
item.description: ...plunging into the void until a faint glow illuminates from bellow, a light not so inviting The Passage, UnderWorld Region UnderWorld Rarity Rare Initiative UnderWorld

item.title: The Pits
item.description: The UnderWorlders are fair... all are guilty until proven innocent The Pits Region UnderWorld Rarity Uncommon Initiative Fire

item.title: The Training Grounds
item.description: The Training Grounds Region __MISSING__ Rarity Ultra Rare Initiative Water

item.title: The Twisted Palace
item.description: The Twisted Palace Region UnderWorld Rarity Unknown Initiative Unknown

item.title: Ulmar's Lab
item.description: Ulmar's Lab Region UnderWorld Rarity Unknown Initiative Unknown

item.title: UnderWorld City, During Van Bloot Ascension
item.description: Underworld City During Van Bloot Ascension Region UnderWorld Rarity Uncommon Initiative Courage   In the Animation, during the M’arrillian Invasion, while Chaor and a small group of loyal UnderWorlders were boldly trying to take down the M’arrillians by themselves in the Marsh of Murk, during the events of UnderWorld Overthrown, Lord Van Bloot, led an army of M’arrillians to the UnderWorld City, taking control of it by force in the name of his new master, Aa’une, and, thus, ascending as the new ruler of the UnderWorld.

item.title: UnderWorld Colosseum
item.description: UnderWorlders have a simple way of settling arguments here: the one left standing is always right Underworld Colosseum Region UnderWorld Rarity Rare Initiative Speed

item.title: Wooden Pillar
item.description: The Runic Grove takes root here, and the UnderWorlders believe it grows even further than up Wooden Pillar Region UnderWorld Rarity Super Rare Initiative Wisdom
